t: Joy (dishwashing liquid) - Wikipedia
s: January 8, 2025 - Joy is an American brand of dishwashing liquid detergent owned by JoySuds, LLC. The brand was introduced in the United States in 1949 by Procter & Gamble.

t: JoySuds | Our History, Joy Since 1949
s: October 31, 2022 - Joy was introduced in 1949 as the first liquid dish soap. As Joy enters its 9th decade, we look forward to building on its rich history of innovation & performance.

t: Iconic Joy® Liquid Dish Brand Expands Into Auto-Dishwashing With The New Joy Blast™
s: June 30, 2022 - JoySuds, LLC was formed in November 2019 to acquire the Joy® and Cream Suds® brands for the US, Canada and certain other Latin American and Caribbean territories from the Procter & Gamble Company.
